hi and welcome you listening to the x22

no they're gonna wait until Obama is out

apart and you know they can only keep

she probably will be we're going to see

but we're going to see a lot of the

I mean we're already seeing bits and

we're going to see more stores closed

to start

we're starting to see this a little bit
they're gonna let things go a little bit

the reality is vastly different for

that
we look at globally the overall US

education needs to improve its income

why did they put this out that said that

is if this economy is so great and we're
down to four point nine percent
unemployment if we want to go and
believe the government why did we have
to modify student loans where they
modified
back in the 80s no were they modified
back in the 90s no why did they have to

to 25 years I'm gonna tell you why
because those individuals coming out of

a lot of them are living with their

that's why they did this and it's

some shopkeepers well they're not
